description.raw:
- Added `FRCBlueDiffDrivePlugin`

-  Added a `minion` vehicle model that uses the plugin

to test:

1. set gazebo model path, e.g. `export GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH=$GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH:/home/ian/depot/frc_blue_team/models`

2. `roslaunch frc_blue_team frc_blue.launch` 


to use the diff drive plugin in your model, add this snippet:

~~~
    <plugin name='diff_drive' filename='libFRCBlueDiffDrivePlugin.so'>
      <left_joint>your_left_joint_name</left_joint>
      <right_joint>your_right_joint_name</right_joint>
      <topic>/blue/joy1</topic>
      <torque>35</torque>
      <turn_rate>8</turn_rate>
    </plugin>
~~~

if you leave out `<left_joint>` or `<right_joint>` then the plugin searches the model and uses the first two revolute joint it sees.
